node.title: Name of victim in Hamilton homicide investigation released
node.description: Police have opened a homicide investigation after a man died at a house in Huntington last night.
node.content:
["Police have opened a homicide investigation after a man died at a house in Huntington last night.", "", "
\nPhoto: RNZ / Marika Khabazi\n
", "Emergency services were called to an incident at a house on Borman Road shortly after 7pm, Detective Senior Sergeant Andrew Saunders said.", "When emergency services arrived they found a man with serious injuries.", "The man has been identified as Perenara Tama McAllister, 30.", "He died at the scene despite recieving immediate medical attention, Saunders said.", "Another man at the house was arrested and police are considering charges.", "Police were not looking for anyone else in connection to the death.", "A forensic examination would be carried out today and there would be an increased police presence.", "A post mortem was expected to be carried out on Monday.", "Police ask anyone with information that could assist to contact them on 105 and quote file number 220305/5348, or anonymously via Crime Stoppers on 0800 555 111."]
